Name: Direct
About the game: Overview This is a color and sound based rhythm game. Go fast, avoid obstacles, and score big. How it works Score points for each set you successfully avoid. Spend points to unlock cosmetic enhancements. Score big to unlock harder difficulty levels. Unlock Slow-Mode using points for an easier ride. Although this is not needed to complete Direct, the gradual increasing speed allows for a higher skill ceiling for higher scores. What to expect 5 difficulty modes 10 unlockable cosmetic ship variations 520 Steam achievements 0-100% in 2 hours Unlockable slow mode so that all players can experience the full game
Meta Title: Direct: Aug 17, 2017, ToastieLabs and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Direct? Check out the release date (Aug 17, 2017), developer insights from ToastieLabs, and a complete game summary.
